executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
IMPORTANT: The app is running at http://localhost:3000

To bypass OAuth authentication, navigate to http://localhost:3000/?test_mode=true instead of the base URL. This will automatically create a test user profile and redirect to the home page, bypassing the login flow.

For TC004 (Home Dashboard test):
1. Navigate to http://localhost:3000/?test_mode=true
2. Wait for automatic redirect to /home (the test mode will auto-login)
3. Verify fortune cards are displayed
4. Test swipe functionality on cards
